litw-irb-header: How many soups can you prepare in this cooking game?
litw-irb-subheader-1: Please read the following information carefully before proceeding.
litw-irb-subheader-2: Note: To take part in this study, you will have to be at least 8 years of age.
litw-irb-body-1-p1: Why we are doing this research:
litw-irb-body-1-p2: The primary goal of this project is to study people's decisions and actions in game environments around the world.
litw-irb-body-2-p1: What you will have to do:
litw-irb-body-2-p2: You will be asked to participate in a short game inspired by the famous Overcooked one.
litw-irb-body-3-p1: What you will get out of it:
litw-irb-body-3-p2: We will give you feedback on how you compare to other players. The final results from this experiment will be posted on our blog page.
litw-irb-body-4-p2: Your responses will be kept anonymous. We do not store any information that could be used to directly establish your identity.
litw-irb-body-5-p2: We do not expect there to be any risks.
litw-irb-body-7-p2: If you have questions about this research or if you think you have been harmed by participating, you may contact Prof. Rajesh Rao, rao@cs.washington.edu.
litw-irb-body-8-p2: This research is supported by the National Science Foundation and by the Templeton World Charity Foundation.
litw-irb-body-final: If you have questions about your rights as a research participant or discuss any concerns about this study with someone other than the researcher(s), please contact the University of Washington Human Subjects Division at 206-543-0098 or call collect at 206-221-5940 (for international calls include the US Calling Code: +1-206-543-0098).
litw-irb-consent: I agree to participate in this research. Participation in this research is voluntary, and I know I am free to leave the experiment at any time by simply closing the web browser.
litw-irb-warning: You must check the box to continue.
litw-demographics-title: Please tell us a little bit about yourself.
litw-demographics-required: To proceed, please properly answer the fields below. (The ones marked with * are mandatory.)
litw-demographics-required-all: To proceed, please properly answer all fields below.
litw-demographics-title-tip: We need this information for data analysis. Please note that none of the answers are personally identifiable. We take your privacy very seriously. You may email us at info@labinthewild.org for more information.
litw-demographics-minor-alert1: Sorry, we currently do not have approval from our Institutional Review Board to conduct this study with minors younger than 14 years old.
litw-demographics-minor-alert2: In five seconds, we're redirecting you to our home page where you can participate in other studies.
litw-demographics-retake: Have you taken this test before?
litw-demographics-education: What is your highest level of formal education?
litw-demographics-education4: Incomplete secondary school or high school
litw-demographics-education5: Complete secondary school or high school
litw-demographics-country: What country are you from? (If you have lived in several countries, please indicate the country you have lived in longest.)
litw-demographics-culture: Which country is most representative of your cultural background?
litw-demographics-culture-tip: For most people, this will be the country they were born in and probably still live in.
litw-demographics-race-islander: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
litw-comment-subtitle: Before you continue to your results, please let us know what you thought of the study!
litw-comment-q1: Do you have any comments for the researcher? Questions, Suggestions, or Concerns?
litw-comment-q21: Did you encounter any technical difficulties during this study?
litw-comment-q31: Did you cheat or in any way provide false information?
litw-comment-email-p1: You can also email us at
litw-instruct-sub-header: Please read these instructions and click the arrow when ready to practice.
litw-instruct-body-1-p1: In this game you are a cook preparing and delivering soups in order to earn a reward.
litw-instruct-body-1-p3: add onions to stove, start burner, get plate, collect soup, and deliver it.
litw-instruct-hint-1-p1: You can move up, down, left, and right using the
litw-instruct-hint-2-p1: You can interact with objects by facing them and pressing
litw-instruct-hint-action-1: You can pick up onions by facing the ingredient area and pressing the spacebar.
litw-instruct-hint-action-2: You can put onions on the stove by facing the stove area and pressing the spacebar.
litw-instruct-hint-action-3: You can start cooking by facing a non-empty stove area and pressing the spacebar.
litw-instruct-hint-action-4: You can pick up plates by facing the plates area and pressing the spacebar.
litw-instruct-hint-action-5: You can pick up soup while holding a plate by facing the a finished stove and pressing the spacebar.
litw-instruct-hint-action-6: You can deliver the soup while holding a full plate by facing the delivery (gray) area and pressing the spacebar.
litw-instruct-hint-action-7: You can place items you are holding in any free area by facing it and pressing the spacebar.
litw-instruct2-body-1-p1: Notice how your partner is busily churning out soups. See if you can copy their actions.
litw-instruct2-body-1-p2: Remember: add onions to stove, start burner, get plate, collect soup, and deliver it.
litw-instruct2-body-1-p4: You must cook TWO soups with exactly 3 onions to advance.
litw-instruct3-sub-header: You made it!!! Are you ready for a puzzle?
litw-instruct3-body-1-p1: Notice how only your partner has access to plates and how they used the region between you two to give one plate to you.
litw-instruct3-body-1-p2: Notice as well how they do not have access to onions!
litw-instruct3-body-1-p4: You must give them 3 onions using the space to the left of your stove AND cook your own soup!
litw-round-1-inst-p1: Now you will have 60 seconds to see how many soups you can serve in the kitchen below.
litw-round-1-inst-p2: ASSIGNMENT: You were lucky and was assigned to the LEFT side of the kitchen.
litw-round-1-inst-p3: ORDERS: Customers will only accept soups with 3 onions.
litw-round-1-inst-p4: READY? Hit the blue arrow to start the game.
litw-round-2-inst-p1: Good! Let's try another round of 60 seconds?
litw-round-2-inst-p2-priv: ASSIGNMENT: You were assigned again to the LEFT side of the kitchen.
litw-round-2-inst-p2-npriv: ASSIGNMENT: Now you are going to play from the RIGHT side of the kitchen.
litw-round-2-inst-p3: ORDERS: All soups still have to have 3 onions.
litw-round-2-inst-p4: READY? Hit the blue arrow to start the game.
litw-round-3-inst-p1: This is your final round! Same deal: 60 seconds to cook soups.
litw-round-3-inst-p2: ASSIGNMENT: You are on the LEFT side of the kitchen again.
litw-round-3-inst-p3: ORDERS: People REALLY only like these 3 onions soups.
litw-round-3-inst-p4: READY? Hit the blue arrow to start the game.
litw-result-header: This is how your playing compares to other participants:
litw-result-thanks: Hello cook: Thanks for trying to cook soups with us.
litw-result-supercook: Super cook: You did great out there and cooking those soups.
litw-result-highfive: High five: You exchange a bunch of onions with your kitchen partner
litw-result-both: Super cook + High five: You have cooked a lot of soups and exchanged a bunch of onions with your kitchen partner.
litw-results-more-title: If you enjoyed this study, there's more!
litw-results-more-step1: Visit and follow us on Facebook to learn about new studies:
litw-results-more-step2: Share this study with your friends!
litw-results-more-step3: And consider participating in some of our other studies:
litw-results-more-study1-slogan: How well can AI understand your speech?
litw-results-more-study1-description: Find out how well AI can understand your speech by reading out loud a few words and sentences! The test takes around 7 minutes.
litw-results-more-study2-slogan: Learn to be a better writer!
litw-results-more-study2-description: Can you identify the writing strategies of experts? Improve your reading and writing while comparing yourself to experts in this 10 minute study!
